keyword: calories in one cup steamed broccoli
title: Calories in One Cup Steamed Broccoli
meta_description: Discover calories in one cup steamed broccoli, including protein, carbs, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with easy tweaks.
h1: Calories in One Cup Steamed Broccoli
assumptions: Chopped broccoli florets, steamed without added salt, butter, or oil; ~156 g per cup.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by broccoli variety, freshness, cooking time, and additions like seasonings. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One cup of steamed broccoli provides ~55 kcal and ~5 g fiber.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged products.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp cheese sauce per cup

faqs.q: How many calories in one cup steamed broccoli?
faqs.a: About 55 kcal for one cup of plain steamed broccoli.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one cup steamed broccoli?
Does steaming broccoli affect calorie count?
faqs.a: Steaming retains most nutrients and calories similar to raw, around 55 kcal per cup.

faqs.q: How much fiber is in steamed broccoli per cup?
faqs.a: Approximately 5.1 g dietary fiber per cup.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in one cup steamed broccoli?
faqs.a: Yes, about 11.2 g total carbs, mostly from natural sugars and fiber.
